clustering

类 MeansClustering

  • java.lang.Object
    • clustering.Clustering
      • clustering.MeansClustering
  • 直接已知子类:
    FCM, KMeans

    public abstract class MeansClustering
extends Clustering
    The super class of any means clustering algorithms, such as kMeans and FCM. It help setting the initial centers.

    Author: Fan Min minfanphd@163.com, minfan@swpu.edu.cn
    Copyright: The source code and all documents are open and free. PLEASE keep this header while revising the program.
    Organization: Lab of Machine Learning, Southwest Petroleum University, Chengdu 610500, China.
    Project: The cost-sensitive active learning project.

    Progress: Almost finished, further revision is possible.
    Written time: July 10, 2019.
    Last modify time: July 21, 2019.

      • 从类继承的字段 clustering.Clustering

        FINE_BALANCE_THRESHOLD, TIMES_FOR_FARTHEST_PAIR

    • 方法详细资料

      • clusterInTwo

        public int[][] clusterInTwo(int[] paraBlock)
                     throws UnableToClusterInKException
        Cluster the given block in two using kMeans, the centers are the first and the last elements.
        覆盖:
        clusterInTwo 在类中 Clustering
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        返回:
        Two blocks
        抛出:
        UnableToClusterInKException - If fails to cluster.

      • getRandomCenters

        public double[][] getRandomCenters(int[] paraBlock,
                                   int paraK)
        Assign a number of randomly selected instances to centers.
        参数:
        paraBlock - The given block.
        paraK - The number of clusters.
        返回:
        Clusters
